jobTitle: Data Scientist – High Frequency Option Market Making Team
jobDescription: Our client is seeking a Data Scientist to join the electronic market making team. The role is geared around data mining and algorithm development and the following: Responsibilities;Decoding raw binary data; compare latency-sensitivity of exchanges; analyze packets of information and captured network protocols such as TCP and UDPBuilding HFT limit order book to track market behaviors and make actionable trading strategiesBuild learning models to predict next price movement using logistic regression and support vector machineAnalyze complex business/technical problems and make sound technical decisions proactively and in a self-directed manner.Requirements:Strong programming skills in C++Expert knowledge of algorithms and data structuresAt least 2-3 years of relevant experience.Good understanding of logistic regression and support vector machineEducation:BS in Computer Science from a top university, GPA 3.8+ If you would like to be considered for the position of Data Scientist, or wish to discuss the role further then please leave your details below. Your resume will be held in confidence until you connect with a member of our team
